title.rendered: “IDF Launches Successful Strikes Against Hezbollah in Lebanon: A Comprehensive Report on Recent Military Actions”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF combat aircraft have completed another strike in Lebanese territory; a series of terror targets where Hezbollah terrorists were operating were destroyed.

For the second time in the last day, combat aircraft attacked a number of terrorist infrastructure and a military site of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanon a short while ago.

In addition, an aircraft combined with artillery fire attacked a terrorist cell from the Hezbollah terror organization that had been shooting from Lebanon into Israeli territory near the Hanita area, and a military building from which shooting was carried out to the Matat area was also attacked, where IDF forces were operating earlier today.

Also, following alerts activated in the north of the country, a number of launches were identified that crossed from Lebanese territory to Israeli territory.

IDF forces attacked the sources of the shooting.

Attached is documentation from the strikes: https://bit.ly/47ET2r3
